turns.content:
You are naming a chat conversation.
Generate a concise 3-6 word title.
No quotes. No punctuation at the end.

User: what is the local model is 
Assistant: A "local model" generally refers to a machine learning model that runs directly on a user's device (like a laptop, phone, or server they control) rather than on a remote server.


Title:

Okay, I understand. I will focus on answering only the user's latest question, using past conversation context when relevant, and adapting to new topics as they arise. I will prioritize being helpful and informative.
